item.title: Wild help on DeltaScape source!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Well, I just finished adding the duel arena to my server, and everything seemed fine…until…

I was in the wild, and i tried to cast barrage on a person the same level as me. It said, “Your level difference is too great. Please move deeper into the wilderness!” This message came up even though we were in level 55 wild, and our combat levels were the same.

If you wield a staff, and autocast it works. If you click the spell, then the player, then the message pops up.

Here is my code:

} if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel && duelFight == false || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && duelFight == false){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }

If someone could help me with this problem, I would be really happy. =]

Thanks in advance!
~Jc22493

Read full topic
